response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I believe it's important to share that the product is worth $1,000,000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this exceptional item to you at a special price of $900,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure that the product finds a deserving owner who appreciates its true worth. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of facilitating a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 900000}
